name: Demit Slayer
description:
Demit Slayer is a Fantasy shoot 'em up game where you play as a girl warrior who have power to defeat king of darkness.

FEATURE
- Challenging 18 Levels with objective per level to clear.
- Go through different environment like plains, desert and volcano.
- Defeat Mid bosses to get their power.
- Change character to get different special shoot.

KEY MAPPING
- "Z" to magicshoot.
- "C" to change character.

WEB COMICS
http://tapastic.com/series/Demit-Slayer

PLAY STORE
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cascadeplay.demitslayer

Facebook page : www.facebook.com/cascadePlay
Twitter : @cascadeplaydev

Thanks for Playing!
